pg002_title: ＜Hakuu Technology Inc. – Our Areas of Expertise and Strengths＞
pg002_summary_items: 【Investment & Consulting Services】
Proven track record in corporate investment and advisory services
M&A intermediation, coordination, and strategic advisory support
Strategic consulting for technology implementation
【Real Estate Services】
Purchase, leasing, management, and brokerage of real estate
Planning and operation of hotels, inns, and guesthouses
Maintenance services for buildings, apartments, and commercial facilities
【Food & Hospitality Services】
Operation of restaurants, cafés, and bars
Comprehensive support including customer service, hygiene, and menu planning
Trusted community-based service development
【Trade & Distribution Services】
Sales, wholesale, import/export of products, semi-finished and raw materials
Support systems covering the entire supply chain
Proven track record in international trade, mainly across Asia
【E-commerce & Information Services】
Online retail and e-commerce business using internet platforms
Development and operation of information collection and delivery services
Multilingual and multi-currency support for global e-commerce
【Tourism & Travel Agency Services】
Licensed general and domestic travel services and agency operations
Planning, booking, and support for inbound and outbound travel
One-stop support for accommodation, transportation, and experience-based tourism
【Our Comprehensive Capabilities】
Cross-industry service design with multi-sector adaptability
Proposals combining global insight and advanced technology
Ability to provide value-added services across all business areas above
